rbiom 2.0.0.9003

Function reference

All functions

adiv_boxplot()
Visualize alpha diversity with boxplots.
adiv_corrplot()
Visualize alpha diversity with scatterplots and trendlines.
adiv_table()
Calculate the alpha diversity of each sample.
as_percent()
Convert absolute counts to relative abundances.
bdiv_boxplot()
Visualize BIOM data with boxplots.
bdiv_distmat()
Make a distance matrix of samples vs samples.
bdiv_heatmap()
Display beta diversities in an all vs all grid.
bdiv_ord_plot()
Ordinate samples and taxa on a 2D plane based on beta diversity distances.
bdiv_ord_table()
Calculate PCoA and other ordinations, including taxa biplots and statistics.
bdiv_table()
Make a data.frame of distances between samples.
bdply()
Split BIOM by metadata, apply function, and return results in a data frame.
biom_build()
Create a BIOM object.
biom_id() `biom_id<-`() biom_comment() `biom_comment<-`()
Get or set a BIOM object's id or comment.
biom_info()
Get BIOM object's miscellaneous information.
biom_merge()
Combine several BIOM datasets into one.
biom_repair()
Run after manually editing a BIOM object's content.
blply()
Split BIOM by metadata, apply function, and return results in a list.
convert_from_phyloseq()
Convert a phyloseq object to an rbiom BIOM object.
convert_to_SummarizedExperiment()
Convert a BIOM object to a SummarizedExperiment object.
convert_to_TreeSummarizedExperiment()
Convert a BIOM object to a TreeSummarizedExperiment object.
distmat_stats()
Run statistics on a distance matrix vs a categorical or numeric variable.
hmp50
Human Microbiome Project - 50 sample demo dataset.
n_samples() n_otus() n_ranks()
Report the number of samples, otus, or ranks in a BIOM.
otu_matrix() `otu_matrix<-`()
Get or set the abundance counts.
otu_names() `otu_names<-`()
Get or set the OTU names.
otu_sequences() `otu_sequences<-`()
Get or set the nucleotide sequences associated with each OTU.
otu_taxonomy() `otu_taxonomy<-`()
Get or set the taxonomy table.
otu_tree() `otu_tree<-`()
Get or set the phylogenetic tree.
plot_heatmap()
Create a heatmap with tracks and dendrograms from any matrix.
print(<BIOM>)
Summarize the contents of a BIOM object
has_tree() has_sequences() is_rarefied()
Check specific properties of a BIOM object.
rare_barplot()
Visualize the number of observations per sample.
rare_corrplot()
Visualize rarefaction curves with scatterplots and trendlines.
rare_depth()
If the samples are rarefied, report the level (depth).
rare_multiplot()
Combines rare_corrplot and rare_barplot into a single figure.
rare_suggest()
Suggest a 'good' rarefaction depth.
rbiom
rbiom: Read/Write, Transform, and Summarize BIOM Data
read_biom()
Extracts counts, metadata, taxonomy, and phylogeny from a biom file.
read_fasta()
Parse a fasta file into a named character vector.
read_tree()
Read a newick formatted phylogenetic tree.
sample_metadata() `sample_metadata<-`()
Get or set the sample metadata.
sample_names() `sample_names<-`()
Get or set the sample names.
sample_rarefy()
Subset counts so that all samples have the same number of observations.
sample_select()
Reduce samples to a specific list
sample_subset()
Subset samples using the BIOM's metadata or taxonomy.
sample_sums()
Sum the observations in each sample.
taxa_barplot()
Display taxa abundances as a stacked bar graph.
taxa_boxplot()
Visualize BIOM data with boxplots.
taxa_corrplot()
Visualize taxa abundance with scatterplots and trendlines.
taxa_heatmap()
Display taxa abundances as a heatmap.
taxa_matrix()
Taxa abundances per sample, at the specified taxonomic rank.
taxa_means()
Get the taxa abundances.
taxa_ranks() `taxa_ranks<-`()
Get or set the names of the taxonomic ranks.
taxa_sums()
Get the taxa abundances.
taxa_table()
Generate a data.frame of taxa abundance for each sample at the specified taxonomic rank.
top_taxa()
Get the names of the most abundant taxa.
tree_data()
Provides a 'treedata' S4 object for use in ggtree functions.
tree_plot()
Display a dendrogram of the phylogenetic tree.
tree_subset()
Create a subtree by specifying tips to keep.
tree_tips()
Names of a phylogenetic tree's tips/leafs.
unifrac()
Compute Weighted and Unweighted UniFrac distance matrices.
write_biom()
Write counts, metadata, taxonomy, and phylogeny to a biom file.
write_counts()
Write BIOM counts to a tab-separated value (tsv) file.
write_fasta()
Write DNA sequences to a file in fasta format.
write_metadata()
Write BIOM metadata to a tab-separated value (tsv) file.
write_taxonomy()
Write BIOM taxonomy map to a tab-separated value (tsv) file.
write_tree()
Write a newick formatted phylogenetic tree.
write_xlsx()
Write data and summary information to a Microsoft Excel-compatible workbook.

Developed by Daniel P. Smith.
